vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
Καινάμ (T, Καϊ-; Rec. Καϊνάν), ό, indecl. (Heb. קֵינָן),
Cainam, Cainan;
__1. son of Enos (Gen.5:9): Luk.3:37.
__2. Son of Arphaxad (Gen.10:24 (LXX): Luk.3:36.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabinfos.shortDef: Cainan, Kenan, "worker in iron, metal worker"
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Luk.3.36;
son of: Arpachshad (H0775);
father of: Shelah (H7974)
vocabinfos._es_Definition: Cainán: (1) hijo de Arfaxad (LUK.3:36) ; (2) hijo de Enoc (LUC.3:37)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
該南 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "他們的鐵匠"
1) 以挪士的兒子 (路 3:37)
2) 亞法撒的兒子, 基督的祖先 (路 3:36)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
该南这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是"他们的铁匠"
1) 以挪士的儿子(路3:37)
2) 亚法撒的儿子, 基督的祖先(路3:36)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time before the Flood, first mentioned at Gen.5.9;
son of: Enosh (H0583);
father of: Mahalalel (H4111); also called Cainan at Luk.3.37;
